topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55026ef56368720ed4e00000#post_55026ef56368720ed4e00000
Okay, you know how big my girlcrush on Satsuki-sama is right? Olivier Mira Armstrong was basically Satsuki-sama before Satsuki-sama existed. She is a tough as nails chick who takes NO LIP from anyone. And she's the kind of woman who will back up any claim she makes. She's willing to fight people, abominations, and even GODS. The sheer charisma this woman exudes is enough to humble anyone.

topics.body: Fun fact. The writer and illustrator for Fullmetal Alchemist, Hiromu Arakawa, actually wrote another manga after she finished FMA. It's called Silver Spoon. And it's about farming.
